alert.note: Alert for Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 4:25PM CDT until June 11 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Seward County in southeastern Nebraska... Northern Saline County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles north of Friend, or 17 miles southwest of Seward, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Friend around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dorchester. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
